en_us: Obtain a Modified weapon or piece of armor from a mob
Use special armor and weapon modifiers to defend against mobs that grow ever stronger.
Mobs get stronger over time, based on each adventurer.\n\nMobs will spawn with higher health, damage, movement speed and with better armour and weapons.
Mobs spawned in different areas have special modifiers.\n\nSome areas and biomes spawn different mobs than usual.
Mobs spawned in %s areas are slightly stronger.\n\nCreepers have a higher blast radius and mobs don't drop their weapons and armour as often.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but faster.

Husks swarms can be found.

More mobs carry fire aspect and flame weapons.

Zombies spawned in %s areas have less health, but can respawn when killed.

Creepers will use Invisibility to sneak up to adventurers.

Slimes are larger and spawn more often.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but spawn in groups.

Skeletons carry melee weapons.

Mobs can be found wearing projectile protection gear.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are stronger.

More mobs carry knockback and punch weapons.

Phantoms can be found here at night.

Mobs spawned in %s areas are slower, but have more health.

Many attacks will apply slowness.

Creepers are not found here.
- Applies poison, weakness or instant health to the attacker\n- Reduced armor

Mobs can spawn with special gear.

Weapons have a 20% drop chance and armour has a 8.5% drop chance.

When dropped, the gear will have a powerful modifier.
The following modifiers can be found on weapons:
- Less attack damage, but has Fire Aspect III-V
- Deals damage to everything within 4.5 blocks
- Stronger attack damage, but has slower attack speed\n- Knockback II-III
- Less attack damage, but quicker attack speed
- Temporarily slows and weakens attacked target
- Shortly after hitting a target, they will be dealt heavy damage, attacking through armor and effects
- Attacks apply lightning charges.\n- 7+ charges cause a lightning strike
- Reduced attack speed, but attacks grant bonus attack speed for 6 seconds
The following armor modifiers are activated while equipped:
- Applies increasing speed and hunger while sprinting\n- Lower movement speed while not sprinting
- Link to any adventurer wearing this armor with the same renamed name\n- All adventurers in the link share their health total
- A floating light follows the wearer\n- Crouching will apply glowing and a light pulse

- Lower attack speed
- Spawns an invulnerable dog that deals 4 damage
- Commanding to sit will cause it to lose aggro
- Feeding it will grant strength
- Mounts receive speed and additional helpful effects
The following armor modifiers are activated when damage is taken:
- Gain absorption for 30 seconds\n- Reduced armor
- Teleport to a random location within 16 blocks when damaged\n- Full knockback resistance when equipped
The following armor modifiers are activated when upon killing:
- Regenerate a heart of health\n- Reduced armor
- Summons a totem that gives allies regeneration, resistance, speed, or strength\n- Totems can stack if mobs are killed within its range of 18 blocks
The following armor modifiers are activated while not in combat:
- Multiple arrows will be shot from a single arrow shot\n- Lower attack speed when equipped
- Gains invisibility when sneaking, when sneaking ends gain attack speed
The following armor modifiers are activated while below half health:
- Stores some damage taken, then restores it when the wearer is out of combat\n- Reduced armor
- Higher attack damage, but lower armor\n- Has an opposite effect when health is below 50%
- AOE of healing effect and regeneration\n- Can be recharged by killing mobs
The following armor modifiers are activated while above half health:
- Damage is dealt until wearer is at half health\n- Resistance III when equipped
- Immune to mining fatigue, poison or weakness, and to hunger, blindness, nausea or wither
Mobs spawned in %s are tougher to kill.\n\nDrowned are faster as well.
Drowned spawned in %s are much more powerful and more frequently carry tridents.\n\nGuardians can be found here even outside of Ocean Monuments.
Mobs spawned in %s areas are weaker, but apply weakness, hunger, and poison.\n\nSpider clusters can be found.
Who thought this was a good idea?
Lights the way, sneak to glow
A loyal friend to fight by your side
Command to sit to lose aggro
Share Health with others in the link
Apply 7 stacks to strike with Lightning
Sword deals %s Damage, sneak to spin faster
A sword rotates around you at attack range
- Has low base attack damage but will double total attack damage
- Reduces armor of attacked target for 10 seconds
- Converts armor from this piece to max health
- Spawns a floating sword to circle around the wearer\n- Lower attack speed when equipped
- Apply a lightning charge to attacker.\n- 7+ charges cause a lightning strike
- Grants 1 bonus max health, up to a cap\n- Taking damage reduces max health
- Gain attack damage, lose attack damage when damaged\n- Nearby mobs have glowing
- Decrease armor and increase attack damage for 15 seconds\n- Effect can stack until piece runs out of armor
- Gain attack damage, attack speed, movement speed and knockback resistance
- Deal fire damage to nearby entities for 10 seconds, damage stacks with more kills\n- Taking damage also adds a stack\n- At 10 stacks also set entities on fire and gain fire resistance
The following armor modifiers are only found in specific places:
- Apply a random potion effect with random level and duration to wearer when damaged
